body_html:
as far as I understand that's not what we do right now

The discussion here is about cuDNN, no? nOutputPlane is a THNN-ism, not a cuDNN-ism. (To be clear, I do not actually know if what CuDNN does if groups doesn't divide up perfectly. Worth a test?)

> as far as I understand that's not what we do right now

The discussion here is about cuDNN, no? nOutputPlane is a THNN-ism, not a cuDNN-ism. (To be clear, I do not actually know if what CuDNN does if groups doesn't divide up perfectly. Worth a test?)
